Name: Tropical Saratoga
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge skewered with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim skewered with maraschino cherry.
Review: Brandy-based, bright, fruity and fresh riff on a classic Saratoga .
Nutrition: One serving of Tropical Saratoga contains 162 calories
